TextView.android:text: Sedentary life: mostly sitting (desk job, little to no exercise).
Light daily activity: short walks, standing more, or light exercise (e.g. yoga, stretching, 1–2×/week gym).
Regular moderate exercise: gym 3–5×/week, running, biking, sports.
High-intensity training: 5–7×/week intense workouts, competitive sports, manual labor jobs, or two-a-days.
